recipe.title: Cranberry Hot Toddy
instructions: Cut tangerines crosswise into 1/4-inch-thick rounds and remove seeds. Stud rind of each tangerine round with 4 or 5 cloves. In a large saucepan, simmer cranberry juice, tangerine rounds, and sugar, covered, 5 minutes. Stir in rum.
Serve toddies with clove-studded tangerine rounds in heatproof glasses.
